title: Dune
description: Dune is set on the desert planet Arrakis, the only source of the spice melange, a valuable substance that extends life and enhances mental abilities. The story follows the aristocratic Atreides family as they take control of Arrakis and become embroiled in a complex web of political intrigue, religious fervor, and ecological challenges. It explores themes of power, destiny, and the consequences of manipulating both the environment and human nature.
